title: enchant
description: Adds an enchantment to a player's selected item.

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

fields.title: enchantmentName
fields.description: An enum for the enchantment that is applied.

fields.title: level
fields.description: Optional. An `integer` that specifies the enchantment level.

fields.title: enchantmentId
fields.description: An integer ID for the enchantment that is applied.

overloads.title: Enchant player using enum
overloads.description: Enchant a target player using and `enchantmentName` from the `enum`.
